participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, with a playful side.
participant_1.background: I'm a huge coffee lover. My father was a construction worker. I hate the color pink. I do not drink alcohol. I enjoy mountain biking as a hobby.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Imaginative and cheerful, loves playing and creating stories.
participant_2.background: I like to play with my dolls. My best friend lives next door. I do not pick up my toys. I have a pet turtle.

content.text: Buongiorno! Such a nice day! How are you?
busy busy . . . running on chai . what do you do for living ?
i like to play with my dolls.
my sister would love to meet you sometime she's 5 ! hows it going tonight ?
i'm busy too with this lion i just shot
no i could never do that how is your day going ?
